name: Blood of Phale
text:
Flood {b}{g}{u} (During your turn, you may pay {b}{g}{u} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”) 
Whenever you flood Blood of Phale or it enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Blood of Phale, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. 

A deck can have up to eight cards named Blood of Phale.
